definition: to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need
to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent

sentences.english: The driver was ticketed for parking in front of a fire hydrant.
sentences.chinese: 消防栓前而接到交通违规罚单。

sentences.english: On every floor there is a fire hydrant.
sentences.chinese: 每个楼层都有一个消防栓。

sentences.english: The firefighters of the military police will come to teach us how to use a fire hydrant this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 武警消防支队的战士们下午将来教我们使用消防栓。

sentences.english: Hoses to hydrants in main deck cut.
sentences.chinese: 右甲板连到消防栓皮龙管破损。

sentences.english: The engine and horses are displayed on a street with street lights and a fire hydrant.
sentences.chinese: 引擎和马匹都显示在一街与街灯和一个消防栓。

sentences.english: But, the type-A fire should be extinguished by using the fixed type hydrant extinguishing fire system.
sentences.chinese: 甲类火则使用固定式消防栓灭火系统灭火。

sentences.english: Alligators may not be tied to fire hydrants.
sentences.chinese: 短吻鳄不可被系在消防栓上。

sentences.english: Pull out the plug and wet him all over, early in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 在一大清早，把消防栓拔掉让他全身湿答答。

sentences.english: Hydrants sin top deck not accessible.
sentences.chinese: 顶甲板的消防栓够不着。

sentences.english: Hydrants must be covered by seals on which there are dates and chops from the factory.
sentences.chinese: 消防栓要加封条，封条写上日期加盖工厂公章。

sentences.english: Hoses to hydrants in starboard deck worn.
sentences.chinese: 右甲板连到消防栓皮龙管破损。

sentences.english: Hydrants in port deck not operational.
sentences.chinese: 左甲板的消防栓不工作。

sentences.english: Mr. Huang used water that had leaked out of a fire hydrant to wash his motor scooter.
sentences.chinese: 黄先生利用从消防栓外漏的水清洗他的摩托车。

sentences.english: They switched to military fire engines to douse the reactors and the pools of spent fuel rods beside them.
sentences.chinese: 他们换成军用消防栓来冷却反应堆和燃料池。

sentences.english: Hydrants in top deck not accessible.
sentences.chinese: 顶甲板的消防栓够不着。
